---

tag: blog
title: June 2017 update
date: 2017-06-15
published: true
permalink: /posts/darkroom-progress-update-june-2017.html
excerpt: Finished, time to open the doors
heroimage: darkroom-safelight32
---

**Apart from some very minor touching up, the darkroom is finished!**

The last 20% is always the hardest, but we're there. The darkroom is fully functional at last. I'll be spending the rest of June making sure all the equipment is functioning fine and getting myself up to speed.

July will be the month Lightbox officially opens. I'm planning an open evening, some kick off black and white development lessons, and will finalise how the space can be hired out.

So, tell your colleagues, friends, and family; a photography darkroom is now open and ready for action! If you fancy a visit, drop me a email/tweet on the details below.
